profileAlternative.name: Jaya Shankar
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineering, Senior Team Lead at MathWorks

positions.title: MathWorks
positions.description:
I lead an engineering team developing technologies for automatic code generation and deployment for deep learning networks to GPU and CPU target devices. I, with my team, work on deep learning network optimizations and backend implementations focussing on embedded deployment and workflows.

Focus areas : Code generation, CUDA, C++ programming, GPU, Deep Learning Deployment, Deep Learning Optimizations, Compilers

roles.title: Senior Team Lead and Principal Software Engineer - Deep Learning Code Generation

positions.title:
Title
Senior Software Developer - C Code Verification
positions.description:
Software developer for Simulink Code Inspector toolbox - a code verification product that runs static analysis on auto-generated C code using IR techniques. The product is used for verifying correctness of C code auto-generated from Simulink, for safety critical applications in Aerospace. Software development involved programming in C++, MATLAB and Simulink, and knowledge of compiler techniques.
…
see more

roles.title: Senior Software Developer - C Code Verification

positions.title:
Title
Application Support Engineer
positions.description: Application support for customers in MATLAB and SIMULINK and various controls/signal processing related toolboxes. Delivered several projects for implementing algorithms using MATLAB and Simulink primarily in the image and signal processing areas for Consulting and Development teams. Projects involved application development in MATLAB, Simulink , C and C++.
